newsitem.title: CHINA: China Jan-Sept copper output up 5.44 pct - paper.
newsitem.headline: China Jan-Sept copper output up 5.44 pct - paper.

text.p: China's output of copper totalled 664,800 tonnes in the first nine months of the year, up 5.44 percent year on year, the China Securities newspaper said on Wednesday.
Copper production in September alone rose 0.96 percent to 73,700 tonnes compared with August, the newspaper said, quoting figures from the State Statistical Bureau.
The bureau had apparently revised the output for August.
Production of copper materials totalled 481,000 tonnes in January to September, down 5.45 percent year on year, the newspaper said.
Production in September alone was 50,400 tonnes, up one percent compared with August, it added.
